...  |
45 | | ...     echo "should_run: ${{ !contains(fromJson('["admin", "maintain", "write"]'), fromJson(steps.get_permissions.outputs.data).permission) }}"
46 | | ...     echo "should_run=${{ !contains(fromJson('["admin", "maintain", "write"]'), fromJson(steps.get_permissions.outputs.data).permission) && github.event.pull_request.user.login != 'dependabot[bot]' }}" >> $GITHUB_OUTPUT
   | |______________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________- info: fromJson(steps.get_permissions.outputs.data).permission may expand into attacker-controllable code
   |
   = note: audit confidence → Low
